model

Class Shape

  • java.lang.Object
    • model.Shape
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    ShapeObservable
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    ColoredShape, ControlPoint, ImageX, ShapeContainer

    public abstract class Shape
extends java.lang.Object
implements ShapeObservable

    Title: Shape

    Description: Abstract class that Shape objects implement.

    Copyright: Copyright (c) 2004 Mohammed Elghaouat, Eric Paquette, Colin B-B

    Company: (ÉTS) - École de Technologie Supérieure

    Version:
    $Revision: 1.13 $
    Author:
    unascribed

      • isThisPointIn

        public final boolean isThisPointIn(java.awt.Point aPt)
        Template pattern. This is the template method that will transform the point to the shape's reference space before calling the isThisPointIn hook method
        Parameters:
        aPt - specified point coordinates
        Returns:
        point contained inside flag value

      • isThisPointInHook

        protected abstract boolean isThisPointInHook(java.awt.Point aPt)
        This method is the hook method of isThisPointIn.
        Parameters:
        aPt - The point in the shape's reference space.
        Returns:
        true if point inside the shape, false otherwise.
